00019         void InputController::loadData(TiXmlElement *element)
00020         {
00021             element->QueryFloatAttribute("minjumpdelay", &minJumpDelay);
00022             element->QueryFloatAttribute("jumpforce", &jumpForce);
00023         }
00024 
00025         InputController::InputController(Entity *entity)
00026                 : Controller(entity)
00027         {
00028                         configuration = InputConfiguration::getConfiguration();
00029             inputManager = InputManager::getInstance();
00030 
00031             /* Some defaults. */
00032             minJumpDelay = 200.0f;
00033             jumpForce = 50.0f;
00034             jumpDelay = 0.0f;
00035         }
00036 
00037         InputController::InputController(Entity *entity,
00038                 TiXmlElement *element): Controller(entity)
00039         {
00040                         load(element);
00041             configuration = InputConfiguration::getConfiguration();
00042             inputManager = InputManager::getInstance();
00043 
00044             jumpDelay = 0.0f;
00045             load(element);
00046         }
00047 
00048         InputController::~InputController()
00049         {
00050         }
00051 
00052         void InputController::affect(float ms)
00053         {
00054             Entity *entity = getEntity();
00055             Vector2D velocity = entity->getVelocity();
00056             CollisionResponsePositioner *positioner = entity->getPositioner();
00057 
00059             if(jumpDelay > 0.0f)
00060                 jumpDelay -= ms;
00061 
00063             if(positioner) {
00064                 if(inputManager->isKeyDown(configuration->getKey("jump")) &&
00065                         positioner->canJump() && jumpDelay <= 0.0f) {
00066                     jumpDelay = minJumpDelay;
00067                     velocity = positioner->getGravity() * -1.0f * jumpForce;
00068                                 }
00069             }
00070 
00071             if(inputManager->isKeyDown(configuration->getKey("left")))
00072                 velocity.setX(-entity->getSpeed());
00073             else if(inputManager->isKeyDown(configuration->getKey("right")))
00074                 velocity.setX(entity->getSpeed());
00075             else
00076                 velocity.setX(0.0f);
00077 
00078             if(inputManager->isKeyTicked(configuration->getKey("action")))
00079                 EntityEventManager::getInstance()->action(entity);
00080 
00081             entity->setVelocity(velocity);
00082         }
00083 
00084         void InputController::setMinJumpDelay(float minJumpDelay)
00085         {
00086             this->minJumpDelay = minJumpDelay;
00087         }
00088 
00089         void InputController::setJumpForce(float jumpForce)
00090         {
00091             this->jumpForce = jumpForce;
00092         }
00093     }
00094 }
